sentences.en: A man in the right relies easily on his rectitude and therefore goes about unarmed.
sentences.cn: 有理的一方很容易仗着自己行为正,平时便毫不戒备.

sentences.en: Alexander is a man of unquestioned moral rectitude.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大是个品行端正无瑕的人.

sentences.en: Confucius taught that moral rectitude is far more important than eloquence.
sentences.cn: 孔夫子教导,品性端正远比雄辩的口才重要.

sentences.en: Despite her famous rectitude -- she attended Mass daily and fined actors who cursed on her set.
sentences.cn: 她坚持每天参加弥撒,并且对那些在她的拍摄现场骂骂咧咧的演员处以罚款,因此她品行 端正 是出了名的.

sentences.en: Having impersonated a man of rectitude long, this a procedure jerry could not face.
sentences.cn: 杰里扮演了正直的人久, 这样的程序他无法面对.

sentences.en: He exuded a rectitude so matter - of - fact that he never needed to appeal to it.
sentences.cn: 他办事公正,实事求是,本性如此,无需申述.

sentences.en: I am sure she is a paragon of rectitude.
sentences.cn: 我可以肯定她是个正直的完人.

sentences.en: In the matter of fact, rectitude is quite oversimplifie!
sentences.cn: 其实正直很简单翻译成英语怎么说啊?

sentences.en: Never go aside from the path of truth and rectitude.
sentences.cn: 切勿偏离真理和正义之道.

sentences.en: Never turn aside from the path of rectitude.
She was indignant with his presumption and self - satisfaction and conscious rectitude.
sentences.cn: 她恼火他的傲慢自满和自以为是.

sentences.en: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.cn: 在追忆往事时,唯一的盾牌是他的行为正直和诚实.

sentences.en: They worry that he has strayed from the path of fiscal rectitude.
sentences.cn: 他们担心卢拉已经偏离了财政廉洁的轨道.

sentences.en: We bestowed aforetime on Abraham his rectitude of conduct, and well were We acquainted with him.
sentences.cn: 以前我确已把正直赏赐易卜拉欣, 我原是深知他的.

sentences.en: Wherever possible, cloak yourself in rectitude.
sentences.cn: 尽可能披上正直的斗篷.

trans.tran_en: behaviour that is honest and morally correct
